description: Generate a planned event time schedule
permissions: Allowed for admins or users with access to the related project transport plan or transport order via policy scope.
side_effects: Creates a planned event time schedule record and computes schedule/warnings based on the provided project transport plan or transport order plan data.
validation_notes: Provide either --project-transport-plan alone or --transport-order with --plan-data. If --project-transport-plan is provided, do not send --transport-order or --plan-data. If --project-transport-plan is missing, both --transport-order and --plan-data are required. --plan-data must be valid JSON and include an events array; each event must include location_id and event_type_id.

flags.name: --plan-data
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON and include events with location_id and event_type_id.

flags.name: --respect-provided-event-times
flags.description: Respect provided event times when computing schedule
